body_html:
Oh I see. Sorry, I meant that I reproduced it on 0.3, which is what you probably have from pip.

I might have fixed this with #3811 (that's where you see the changes in functional.py) or something else might have fixed it down the line, but I've verified that this doesn't crash on master anymore. @sxqqslf if you build from source, the error should go away :) (instructions are in the README).

I might have fixed this with #3811 (that's where you see the changes in functional.py) or something else might have fixed it down the line, but I've verified that this doesn't crash on master anymore. @sxqqslf if you build from source, the error should go away :) (instructions are in the README).
body:
Oh I see. Sorry, I meant that I reproduced it on 0.3, which is what you probably have from pip.

I might have fixed this with https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/3811 (that's where you see the changes in functional.py) or something else might have fixed it down the line, but I've verified that this doesn't crash on master anymore. @sxqqslf if you build from source, the error should go away :) (instructions are in the README).
